title: can i refund my name change?
body: hi i changed my name a few days ago from unjedi to Bard IRL and i regret it i was wondering if i can get a refund for my rp and change my name back to unjedi is this possible? thanks

replies.body: Yes, per our [_Refund Policy_](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ), so long as you have a refund token available, the previous name hasn't been taken, and the change was less than 90 days ago,  you can reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and one of our specialists will help you out.
Hello iam trying to refund my name change and its not letting me

Hello.
Send a support ticket here; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
